content.description:
EMPLOYMENT IN AGRICULTURE, FOR SELECTED REGIONS, 1991-2019

Source: World Bank

The graph shows regional trends in employment in agriculture since 1991.
content.question:
A. Compare the trend lines for South Asia and sub-Saharan Africa during the 1991 to 2006 time period.

B. Explain the degree to which internal migration patterns have affected agricultural employment in the region of East Asia and the Pacific.

C. Explain a possible limitation of the data in the graph to explain the impacts of mechanization on the percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture.

D. Using a region on the graph, explain how the region’s changes in the percent of the workforce engaged in agriculture will affect the roles of women in society.
